reviewText: This is an older show that previously aired on the History channel probably back in the 90s so it is a bit dated, but was still worth the purchase.  Anyone who is a history channel buff or Bermuda Triangle theorist would enjoy this show.

This is a theoretical view of the "Burmuda Triangle" OK, the Burmuda Triangle is also Theoretical, this is just another twist on the story / legend / myth.
Interesting at some points and rather boring at others. It is at least a "classy" show, as most History Channel shows seem to be and worthy of watching if you are into this sort of thing. I guess anything is possible in this crazy universe.
